title: Whiskeytown National Recreation Area: Directions to Kayak Programs
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Directions to Kayak Programs              Directions to Kayak Programs      Brandy CreekFor scheduled kayak tours originating from Brandy Creek the kayak shed is located at the north-end of Brandy Creek Parking Lot "B".From Redding, take Hwy 299W. At the Whiskeytown Visitor Center turn left on Kennedy Memorial Drive. Drive south towards Whiskeytown Dam. At the fork, follow the road to the right, crossing over the dam. The paved road winds around the lake to the Brandy Creek Beach area. Turn right at the entrance to Brandy Creek Beach area. Follow the road to Parking Lot "B". Look for the “Kayak Tours” sign at the north end of the parking lot.
